===Overview===
The '''Cliff Forest People ''' is a [[human]] agrarian tribe society based in the [[Savage Land]]. They lived close to a steep cliff which they used for survival. The Cliff Forest People scrape life from the generous soil that drifts into outcroppings at every point of the rock.{{r|Ka-Zar Vol 4 1}}

===Events===
The Cliff Forest People allied themselves with the [[Durammi (Earth-616)|Durammi]] against a unidentified barbaric tribe who had kinapped their women. They were saved from the barbarians by [[Edward Culhaney (Earth-616)|Edward Culhaney]] and [[Kevin Plunder (Earth-616)|Ka-Zar]]{{r|Savage Tales #10}}.
